name: Salamander's Nightmare
description:
Salamander's Nightmare is an action videogame with tactical espionage elements set in a dystopian future threatened by dark forces. 

Little Salamander is a special agent infiltrating an enemy base about to discover a terrible secret weapon. Your mission as a player is to thwart the enemy's plans and get out of the base alive.

The dynamics of the game and its retro style pay homage to the classics of the Playstation era, although the behavior of the enemies introduces new mechanics never seen in this genre of games.

Important: Currently we only have available a playable prototype that illustrates the game concept.
